name: zh-cangjie
description: Convert strings to/from cangjie chars (人弓火 -> ONF / ONF -> 人>弓火) and convert chinese characters to/from cangjie (雨 -> 一中月卜/MLBY -> 雨)

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-unit-coverage
scripts.lint: eslint -c .eslintrc.js lib/**/*.js  && echo '  ✓ Checked files with eslint and everything looks alright!'

author: Jarrod Linahan <jarrod@linahan.id.au> (http://jarrod.linahan.id.au/)
